title: Nightvee & the Warriors For Andromeda
html_content:
Nightvee & the Warriors For Andromeda is an expansion pack of Chris's custom TSSSF cards, consisting of lore involving the CPU Goddesses, Jacob Sockness, R. Righteous, and other enablers.

Contents

  • 1 Pack images
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Cards
  • 4 References

Pack images

Description

Nightvee helps in prepping the Goddesses for an adventure in another galaxy in this Dimension. With the help of Maker, Nightvee gathers Chris Chan Sonichu and the other CPUs of Dimension 1218 to not only help in the Dimension Merge's completion, but to set them out to take down a really great threat all the way from the Andromeda Galaxy.

With the shipping grid to visually aid you, you, too, can help guide the deities towards abolishing slavery and taking down a war-mongering monster.

TSSSF Core Deck or Sonichu Deck are required for playing the game with this Expansion Pack. This pack contains 46 cards.

Cost: $22.00[1]

Cards

Card Name Type Icon Effect Description Date
BFFs Ship Heart N/A Rosey and Kel were nearby as Creamarina was getting yelled at by her ex-trainer. Rosey stood up from Creamarina, and the trainer walked off in a huff. Creamarina was most grateful to have a friendship with Rosey and Kel. 12 July 2022
Black Hole Goal Checkmark Win this Goal when: You discard 3 Pony cards in a single turn. A vast nothingness that absorbs everything that goes into it. What a way to be Shipped; being sucked into one of these. 30 June 2022
Carrie Krueger Pony Female, Unicorn Horn 300 Year-Old Middle Schooler (Special): While this card is in your hand, you may discard an Î© Pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. Proud devotee of the CPU Godess Christine Weston Chandler and Magi-Chan. Also the CPU Goddess of the Blue and White Powermac G3. 10 July 2022
CPU Amethyst Heart Pony Female, Alicorn Pioneering Blades (Replace): While this card is in your hand, you may discard a Pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. Cannotonia is the CPU of the LaserActive Console and the Nation of Lexxvania. She likes to get down to the nitty-gritty, directly. She is intelligent and insightful, and very aggressive in battle and combat. 4 January 2020 (leaked)[2]
CPU Bismuth Heart Pony Female, Alicorn Colourful Learning (Copy): You may copy the power of any Pony card currently on the shipping grid, except for Pony cards with the Changeling keyword. Vee is the CPU of the V-Smile Console and the Nation of Smileville. She generally likes to troll around, but she's of good intentions and observation. She likes to be a leader, because her ideas are direct and forward. When she gets depressed, she goes totally grey and really moody. 4 January 2020 (leaked)[2]
CPU Emerald Heart Pony Female, Alicorn Soulja Goodness (Draw): You may draw 1 card from the Ship or Pony deck. Tapu is the CPU of the Souljagame Console and the Nation of Gizzala. A youthful, energetic and quirky type, she likes to do her best and have fun with everyone. She's good on offense as she is on supporting everyone and raising their spirits. 4 January 2020 (leaked)[2]
CPU Magenta Heart Pony Female, Wing with Unicorn Horn Pair of Controllers (Special): You may search for 1 card from the Pony discard pile, and 1 card from the Ship discard pile, and put them into your hand. If they are still in your hand at the end of your turn, discard them. Meghan, the CPU of the Nintendo Switch, and the Nation of Octobarika, giverns over and works with ehr allies and other deities in the safety and well-being of her peoples, and as many as possible. She is also a very good friend of Chris Chan Sonichu 10 July 2022
CPU Onyx Heart Pony Female, Wing with Unicorn Horn Nyan! (Replace): While this card is in your hand, you may discard a Pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. Kathy("Kat") is the CPU of the Atari Jaguar and the Nation of Neorhodesia. She is really smart and a little finicky, but her heart is almost in the right place. She may not have a spot of ADD, but when she sets her sights on a goal, she does not let up. She also likes to play with and defend her comrades and friends. 10 July 2022
CPU Opal Heart Pony Female, Alicorn Shimmering Colours (3-Way Swap): You may swap up to 3 Pony cards on the grid. Silva is the CPU of the WonderSwan Console and the Nation of Swaland. She sees and appreciate things of good beauty and awesomeness. A bit flighty at times, she is still a good-hearted nerd in her own way. 4 January 2020 (leaked)[2]
CPU Sonichu Henshin Belt Pony Gender-neutral CPU Sonichu Henshin Belt

This card has no Race CPU/SONICHU HENSHIN! (Draw) You may draw 1 card from the Ship or Pony deck.

After years of development, R. Righteous has crafted a device where users are able to transform and tap within the CPUs, Sonichus, and CWCVille as a whole. Since the device takes shape of a colourful gaming console, it utilizes special gaming cartridges known as GASHATs in order for one to transform into a CPU or Sonichu/Rosechu temporarily... 10 July 2022
CPU Topaz Heart Pony Female, Alicorn Epyx Action (New Goal): You may discard 1 active Goal and draw 1 new Goal to replace it. Emily is the CPU of the Atari Lynx Console and the Nation of Chilanna. A fun and assertive type that likes to be rebellious. She is motivated by the anticipation of adventure and action. She always gives her best in the heat of battles. 4 January 2020 (leaked)[2]
Celestial Key Pony Unicorn Open The Door or Portal (Retrieve): While this card is in your hand, you may choose a Pony card on the grid and put it into your hand, then play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. A Key of a Clestial [sic] or Goddess that is able to unlock and open about any enchantment and blessing, including between Dimensions. This particular key is a chunk of Lightning Strike Quartz, infused and linked with Chris Chan Sonichu: the Goddess, CPU Blue Heart. With this personally enchanted key, she can and will complete the Dimension Merge when the time is correct to do so by the course of fated events. 9 August 2020 (leaked)
Cremarina Pony Female, Unicorn Horn Oceanic Operetta (Special): Until the end of your turn, you may add a keyword to all Pony cards shipped with this one. This power cannot be copied. A Primarina was hit by a bit of the energy from the Chaotic Rainbow of 2003 and became what she is today. Her ex-trainer abandoned her out of jealousy. Creamarina usually keeps a coole heard under pressure, and she is a very strong battler and fighter. 10 July 2022
Fire Nightvee Pony Male, Unicorn Horn Visionary Flames (Search: You may search the Ship or Pony discard pile for 1 card of your choice and put it into your hand. If It's still in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it. He is used to the hot and fiery temperatures, but also likes to chillax. Not only are his flames are super hot and come in many colours, but he can see into other locations or dimensions within his flames, like windows. While fired-up in attitude, he tends to be reserved as not to overheat himself. 10 July 2022
Gate Crystal Ship Heart Swap

You may take one Pony card attached to this card and swap it with another Pony Card on the shipping grid.

A crystal that can open a warp gate. 13 July 2022
Good Mirror of ElAeRa Pony Unicorn 1218>-<C-197 (Swap): You may swap 2 Pony cards on the shipping grid. An enchanted mirror created based on the original words of the Elfen of Elaera, but created with the skills and magic of a Goddess. This mirror allows portal access between Dimensions 1218 and C-197, as well as a boosted effect where the temple and property dimensions it resides in allows the temple, itself, and all inside and around the temple to switch between both dimensions on the very spot in Ruckersville, Virginia, USA. 9 August 2020 (leaked)
Group Image Ship Heart N/A N/A 13 July 2022
Harriet Pony Female, Horseshoe Devious Intentions (Keyword Change): When you attach this card to the grid, you may choose one Pony card this card is shipped with. Until the end of your turn, that Pony card gains one keyword of your choice, except for Pony names. Harriet was one of Giovanni's spies and cohorts, she also liked to be deceptive with Giovanni for her own goals. Giovanni knew about this and kept his suspicions of the "wascally wabbit." 10 July 2022
Jacob Pony Male, Unicorn Horn Dragon Pulse (New Goal): You may discard 1 active Goal and draw 1 new Goal to replace it. After reconciling with Chris Chan Sonichu, Jacob sought to help take down Jakoba with Chris Chan and everyone else on the Dimensionally-Merged Earth, as all OCs of these dimensions come together to take down the war-mongering monster. 10 July 2022
Jakoba Pony Male, Alicorn Overpowered (Special): This card can ONLY be swapped, discarded or removed from the shipping grid by the effect of an Alicorn with the Princess keyword. This power cannot be copied. For a time, Jakoba was a God in the Andromeda Galaxy, but he was keeping the seat warm for the next God-in-waiting, and was dethroned. He still acts as a war-monger and rampaging leader of the Rokat Empire and over the planet of Kidasuna. His wants include conquering other planets. 11 March 2021[3]
Jakoba's Ultimate Fate Goal Checkmark When [sic] this Goal when: Jakoba is removed or discarded from the grid by the effect of an [Alicorn] with the Princess keyword. During the big battle on Earth between Jakoba and Chris Chan Sonichu, after Jacob offers his energy and powers to give her an instant recharge, Chris Chan lands the final Blow and Jakoba of Dimension 1218 finally falls dead without reincarnation or revival, very much like the Jakoba of C-197 and most other Dimensions and Timelines. 9 August 2020 (leaked)
Jubali Pony Male, Wing with Unicorn Horn This card can be used as a Pony or Ship card. As a Ship card: Neither card this Ship is attached to can be discarded or removed from the shipping grid. As a Pony card: You may draw 1 card from the Ship or Pony deck. This power cannot be copied. God of Love and Passion. 10 July 2022
Kylechu Pony Sonichu, Special Muscling Sciences (Swap): You may swap 2 Pony cards on the shipping grid. A good friend with CPU Aqua, and a survivor of the fallen Dimension of ZX-49. Kylechu is an intelligent and tough type, with smarts in physics and science. He knows that when things get really tough, you get dirty to get shit done. 2 July 2022
Lighting Nightvee Pony Male, Unicorn Horn Thunder Pin Missiles (Special): If this card is shipped with a Villain, you may discard that Pony card from the grid and play a Pony card from your hand in its place. This power card cannot be copied. More aggressive in this form, he favors being flashy and showy with his electric attacks and pin missles in battle. He will certainly give his foes a run for their money. He will stop at nothing in his pursuits and goals, including defending his allies and friends. 10 July 2022
Michiro Pony Male, Unicorn Horn Scholar Sciences (Search): You may search the Ship or Pony discard pile for 1 card of your choice and put it into your hand. If it's still in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it. Michiro is a scholar of the upper classes on Kidasuna, with many a knowledge on magic and science. He has mentored Jacob "Sockness" Hunter and Nab'e Sonichu in their mastery of their respective magics, skills, abilities and powers. Jacob is not perfect. Nab'e is a hidden gem. 11 July 2022
Michiro's Guidance Ship Heart When you attach this card to the grid, you may choose one Pony card attached to this Ship. Until the end of your turn, that Pony card becomes an ðŸ¦„ and gains the Princess keyword. This cannot affect Pony cards with the Changeling keyword. Michirio spent many years training Jacob to use his magic abilities and skills with ritualistic styles. The magic was mostly miss-or-hit with Jacob for a quite a while, but he improved. Michiro remains despondent on the fact that Jacob remains emotionally fragile and unstable. 14 July 2022
NabÃ© Pony Male, Unicorn Horn Hidden Power (Retrieve): While this card is in your hand, you may choose a Pony card without the Villain keyword on the grid and put in into your hand. Then, play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. Nab'e is a Special Sonichu born on Kidasuna, where he's lived his whole life up til when he was needed to come to earth and help us out for our future. He was raised by Michiro, and Nab'e has a hidden psychic power that will be key in the upcoming battles. 11 July 2022
Nightvee Pony Male, Unicorn Horn Lucid Dreaming (Copy): You may copy the power of any Pony card currently on the shipping grid, except for Pony cards with the Changeling keyword. Disinterested in battle, Nightvee would much rather use his moves to impress his friends than to use them for battle. If given little choice, he will fight, mostly to defend the innocent. Nightvee has a strong sense of justice. He always chooses to attempt diplomacy over violence. 11 July 2022
Nightvee Pendant Pony Gender-Neutral Glimmering Stones (Keyword Change): When you attach this card to the grid, you may choose one Pony card attached to this Ship. Until the end of your turn, that Pony card gains the Nightvee keyword. Meghan weilds this pendant for Nightvee, as it contains the number of elemental stones that transform Nightvee from his normal form into one of his other elemental forms. Nightvee is ale to wield it for himself when needed, or he can access it remotely. He prefers to remain docile by default. 11 July 2022
Princess Fehuni Hitikara Pony Female, Alicorn For The Peoples! (Special): While this card is on the grid, when Jakoba is shipped with this card or Chris Chan, remove Jakoba from the grid (he does not go to the discard pile). This power cannot be copied. In my past life before being born anew as a Special Half-Sonichu, I was a Princess on the planet of Kidasuna in the Andromeda Galaxy in Dimension 1218. I was still young and naive during her time, but I did her best for her people, yet I became overwhelmed and was exiled to this life. Now I am back anew and a lot wiser, and with everyone else, we will abolish slavery on Kidasuna and take Jakoba down for good, for Kidasuna, and for the safety of Earth. 16 December 2019[4]
Proto. Magi-Chan GASHAT Pony Gender-neutral GASHATTO! MAGI-CHAN SONICHU! (Search) You may search the Ship or Pony discard pile for 1 card of your choice and put it into your hand. If it's still in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it. "GASHATTO! MAGI-CHAN SONICHU! LEVEL UP!" 11 July 2022
R. Righteous Pony Gender-Neutral, Wing with Unicorn Horn ELECTRIC HEDGEHOG HENSHIN! (Replace): While this card is in your hand, you may discard a pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. "ELECTRIC HEDGEHOG HENSHIN! The defender of thyne holy CPU Goddess, R. RIGHTEOUS!" 11 July 2022
Righteouschu Pony Gender-Neutral, Horseshoe SONICHU HENSHIN! (Replace) While this card is in your hand, you may discard a Pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. As Righteous tapped within the CPUs and Sonichus, xe gained the ability to become a Sonichu for a period of time. With the help of the CPU Sonichu Henshin device xe crafted, and with the activation phrase of "SONICHU HENSHIN"-- xe became RIGHTEOUSCHU, defender of Christine Chandler, CPUs and the Nation of CWCVille! 11 July 2022
Rokat Grunt Pony Male, Earth Pony I Want Out of This Racket (New Goal): You may discard 1 active Goal and draw 1 new Goal to replace it. In the Rokat Empire, their battalion mainly consists of trained soldiers and slaves. Nobody gets paid, and the food they serve is mediocre at best. The only recluse they have is the designated time periods for rest (equal to only a few Earth hours). They really are quite strict there. Even the Grunts often talk of how awful the treatment and abuse is; to some of them, they know not the better life outside. It is very sad. 9 August 2020 (leaked)
Rokat Technology Pony Unicorn Horn I'd Tell You... (Special): When this card is Swapped at any time on the sipping grid, remove the card from play. This power cannot be copied. Technology typically found in the Andromeda galaxy, and rare in other galaxies; this is seriously powerful stuff. 11 July 2022
Saving Kidasuna Goal Checkmark Win this Goal when: A Villain is discarded or removed from the shipping grid by the power of an ðŸ¦„ card. Kidasuna is a planet in the Andromeda galaxy overtaken by Jakoba and the Rokat Empire. We aim to absolve their cruelty withing the communities. 30 June 2022
Science Mission Ship Heart When you attach this card to the grid, you may choose one Pony card attached to this Ship. Until the end of your turn, that Pony card gains one keyword of your choice, except for Pony names. The glactic facility of the Rokat travel across galaxies to gather intel and goods for their intentions. 14 July 2022
Shocking Teamwork Ship Heart N/A At a picnic between Meghan, Nightvee, Nights, Chris Chan and Magi-Chan, Harriet interrupts to kidnap Nights. Nightvee goes Lightning Form, while Chris Chan transforms, and the two of them rush to rescue Nights. -"Nightvee" Special #1 14 July 2022
Simple Mediation Goal Checkmark Win this Goal when: No Pony card has been discarded from the shipping grid during a turn, and at least one new Pony card and one new Ship card is added onto the grid (This Goal is Not Earned during the First Round of the game). The meditation and fountain areas of Kidasuna are usually quite serene, peaceful an quiet to gather energy, recover, and power up. 30 June 2022
Summon A Celestial Ship Heart When this card is attached to the shipping grid, you may return all cards, except for all Start Cards, and this card, presently on the grid into the respective decks, and then draw until you have you hand limit. Also shuffle all face-up Goal cards into the Goal deck and draw a new set. If you use this power, remove this card from pray. This power cannot be copied. A Celestial can trigger a new creation with new perimeters. 15 July 2022
Supernova Ship Heart All Pony cards attached to this card are unable to activate their powers. A star that suddenly increases greatly in brightness because of a catastrophic explosion that ejects most of its mass. 11 March 2021[5]
The Black Moon Ship Heart When you attach this card to the grid, until the end of your turn, all Pony cards attached to this ship become any named Gender, Keyword and Race. The Black Moon is a basic spaceship of the Rokat. IT is used to invade planets and move soldiers. 15 July 2022
VR-Projected Slavery Ship Heart N/A In the Rokat Empire, they impose slavery. Even when projected to other locations via Virtual Reality Projection, which literally ends up sending their individuals to real locations in C-197 and 1218, transporting goods between Dimensions. Nobody gets paid. I know; I took a few shifts for myself to see the happenings. Everyone was just plain miserable and frightened of the Rokat Empire and of Jakoba. He's going down, and Slavery will be Abolished on Kidasuna. 4 January 2020 (leaked)[2]
Wabbit Hunting Season Goal Checkmark Win this Goal when: Harriet is discarded from the shipping grid. Meghan, feeling Harriet was just too much, she pulled her Ace and summoned her Rowlette to kill the rabbit and save Nights, while Zappy was being distracting to everyone elsse. Harriet has a backstory, but it wasn't chronicled yet. 30 June 2022
Water Nightvee Pony Male, Unicorn Horn Towering Waters (Draw): You may draw 1 card from the Ship or Pony deck. While maipulating the waters around him, Nightvee likes to go with the flow. He can swim upwards, sky-high. along a flowing upward stream he can manifest. He can purify and clean waters erupt from even in the dirtiest of sewers; preferring to keep it clean in the oceans and rivers. He is serene and philosophical in this form. 12 July 2022
Welcome To Kidasuna Goal Check Mark Win this Goal when: Jacob is shipped with Chris Chan "Ah. Here we are, Jacob. Welcome back to Kidasuna. I told you I'd be the one who transports you here. And we did it with Faster-Than-Light Teleportation of my powers and abilities." -Chris Chan Sonichu 12 December 2019[6]

The Players

People: Chris â€¢ Ben Saint â€¢ ProjectSNT â€¢ MKRNightVee â€¢ AquaDiamond8 â€¢ Jacob Sockness â€¢ Sarah and Steve â€¢ Helena Fiorenza â€¢ The Sergeant at Arms â€¢ Multidimensional White Knights â€¢ Kai â€¢ Midnight Moonflower â€¢ Naught â€¢ Geno Samuel

The TSSSF Packs

Jacob is shipped with Chris Chan
